plot outline: A film about the farmers who work hard to earn themselves their food in the scorching sun and the brave hearts who are risking their lives for the security of the nation on its borders. It mainly tries to put into focus the vicious circle that the farmers find themselves caught in. They seem to have no escape from it and thus are forced to commit suicide.
title: Veeda Ek Sangharsh
plot: A film about the farmers who work hard to earn themselves their food in the scorching sun and the brave hearts who are risking their lives for the security of the nation on its borders. It mainly tries to put into focus the vicious circle that the farmers find themselves caught in. They seem to have no escape from it and thus are forced to commit suicide.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
